name: Bedlam (itch) (Paolo Mazzon (libertea/caveguy/plo))
description:
Fight your way through a huge underground world to hunt down the commander.

Features

  • Many different weapons and spells to find and unlock
  • Find and help interesting characters along the way
  • Learn new skills along the way to help your journey
  • Navigate through a dangerous and sprawling underground expanse filled with dangerous enemies
  • Kill the commander

NOTE: Gamepad is required to play, also please extract the zip archive before running the game.
